io.github.josephmeghanathd
 

  • Uses of NanoRetry in io.github.josephmeghanathd

    Methods in io.github.josephmeghanathd that return NanoRetry
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static NanoRetry<Void>
    NanoRetry.of(CheckedRunnable action)
    Initializes a retry configuration for a side-effect operation (no return value).
    static <T> NanoRetry<T>
    NanoRetry.of(CheckedSupplier<T> action)
    Initializes a retry configuration for an operation that returns a value.
    NanoRetry<T>
    NanoRetry.retryOn(Class<? extends Throwable> exceptionClass)
    Specifies an exception type that should trigger a retry.
    NanoRetry<T>
    NanoRetry.withBackoff(Backoff backoff)
    Configures the backoff strategy to determine the delay between retries.
    NanoRetry<T>
    NanoRetry.withMaxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
    Sets the maximum number of attempts (including the initial call).
    NanoRetry<T>
    NanoRetry.withPerAttemptTimeout(Duration timeout)
    Sets a timeout for each individual attempt.
    NanoRetry<T>
    NanoRetry.withTimeout(Duration timeout)
    Sets a global timeout for the entire execution sequence (including all retries and backoffs).
